rules_text:
Exceed [i](Whenever you cast a noncreature spell with mana value greater than the number of +1/+1 counters on this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]
Whenever Distraction Specialist attacks, tap target creature.
flavor_text: [i]“You'd think this would stop working, but none of these creatures have resisted grandma's recipe yet.”[/i]
